timeline.message: Corrected LiftOverIntervalList documentation error stating that it works for VCFs

timeline.bodyText: could you reference the IntervalListTools documentation for information about the interval_list format?
timeline.author: yfarjoun
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -44,7 +44,7 @@ * This tool adjusts the coordinates in an interval list on one reference to its homologous interval list on another * reference, based on a chain file that describes the correspondence between the two references. It is based on the * UCSC LiftOver tool and uses a UCSC chain file to guide its operation. - * It accepts both Picard interval_list files or VCF files as interval inputs. + * It accepts a Picard interval_list file as an input. Note: for lifting over VCF files use LiftoverVcf tool.

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/src/main/java/picard/util/LiftOverIntervalList.java b/src/main/java/picard/util/LiftOverIntervalList.java index e345400d1..ba89ff624 100644 --- a/src/main/java/picard/util/LiftOverIntervalList.java +++ b/src/main/java/picard/util/LiftOverIntervalList.java @@ -44,7 +44,8 @@ import java.util.List; * This tool adjusts the coordinates in an interval list on one reference to its homologous interval list on another * reference, based on a chain file that describes the correspondence between the two references. It is based on the * UCSC LiftOver tool and uses a UCSC chain file to guide its operation. - * It accepts a Picard interval_list file as an input. Note: for lifting over VCF files use LiftoverVcf tool. + * It accepts a Picard interval_list file as an input. See {@link IntervalListTools} documentation for information on + * interval_list format. Note: for lifting over VCF files use LiftoverVcf tool. *
*
